<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>bhante</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 199 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> This is a contracted form of bhadante. It is used as a reverential term of address, "Lord", "Reverend sir", and is the proper address of Buddha, of Buddhist priests, of ṛishis, tāpasas, etc. </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  piyo me bhante udayabhaddo kumāro.<br /> abhikkantaṃ bhante  abhikkantaṃ bhante.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>bhagavā</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 176 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> Worshipful, venerable, blessed, holy. This word is generally used as an epithet or name of a Buddha, in particular, Sākyamuni </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">   tatra sudaṃ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.<br /> vivari bhagavā dvāraṃ.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>dassanāya</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 101 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> Seeing, sight; meeting or associating with; opinion, doctrine, belief; kowledge; sotāpatti, or the knowledge gained by one who is walking in the first path; an eye; showing, illustrating </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  icchati ca tāvadeva  bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ.<br /> tamete  bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantīti.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>upasampajja</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 100 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> To attain, enter on, take upon oneself; to reach, approach </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja  viharati.<br />  catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>puriso</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 94 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> A man; a male; a person, individual; an attendant </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  seyyathāpi mahārāja puriso bandhanāgāre  baddho assa.<br /> seyyathāpi  mahārāja puriso  addhānamaggappaṭipanno.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>jānāti</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 48 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> To know, to gain knowledge of; to comprehend, to perceive; to ascertain; to recognize; to be intelligent </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  ko nu kho pana bho jānāti jīvitānaṃ.<br /> tatra  bhikkhu mattaṃ jānāti paṭiggahaṇāya.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>devo</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 45 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> A deva, a god, a celestial being, an angel; a cloud; a king; the sky, the air; death </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">   taṃ devo pūraṇaṃ kassapaṃ payirupāsatu.<br />  taṃ devo makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ payirupāsatu.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>abhavissa</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 39 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> Non-liability; inability, an impossibility </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>nanu</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 39 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> A particle generally used in asking questions to which an affirmative answer is expected, i.e., nanu passasi, do you not see? </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">   rudaṃ mattikathūpasmiṃ nanu tvaññeva dummatīti.<br />  nanu sampati kālo me nibbānatthāya puttikā.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>vacanaṃ</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 39 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> Speaking, saying, declaring; enjoining, injunction; advice; word, speech, utterance, expression; sentence, passage, text </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">   tasmiṃ me vacanaṃ natthi tvañcārahāmi vattave.<br />  sānuṃ pabuddhaṃ vajjāsi yakkhānaṃ vacanaṃ idaṃ.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>bhagavanto</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 39 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> Worshipful, venerable, blessed, holy. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>dibbena</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 38 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> Divine eye, supernatural vision. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>ni</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 35 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> A preposition having properly the meaning of downwards, much used in composition</p><hr/<p> and before a vowel -nir. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <tr> <td valign="bottom" style="text-align: right;font-size: x-large;"><b>tiṭṭheyya</b></td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> &nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> &nbsp; </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="middle"> <b>Occurences:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> 32 </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" valign="middle"> <b>Part of Speech:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="bottom"> <i>n</i> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Definition:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top"> To stand; to stand aside, be excepted or omitted, remain behind; to stay, stop, remain; to dwell, continue, abide, last, endure, remain constant, live, exist, be </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" valign="top"> <b>Example:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp; </td> <td align="left" valign="top">  so tiṭṭheyya .<br />  atimāne na tiṭṭheyya nibbānamanaso naro.<br /> </td> </tr> <tr><td align="right" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> <td align="left" valign="top"> &nbsp;</td> </tr></table>
